column3: Can you plase also fix this in the crypter.cpp and use a more detailed commit-message? If you do so I'm fine with this.\n
Good, now if you merge them into 1 commit everything is perfect :).\n"git rebase origin -i" helps :).\n

I don't want to be a party pooper but uhm... the file _is_ called COPYING:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/COPYING

I cannot find a license.txt anywhere in the repos.
My mistake..\nSo this means all the other headers are wrong? And should instead be changed to COPYING?\n

I just noticed that the file is copied as `license.txt` on win32 for the gitian build.

...confusing... Then again, I suppose the name in git is leading.
Then it's wrong in ALL other headers and cpp files ;).\n
Will make a new pull for this, updating the license header in all the necessary files. \n
